name: Drug Lord: RTS the Video Game (Canceled)
blurb: Drug Lords don't just happen by luck. They scheme, connive and stab one another in the back. Retire in style and not in a fancy coffin.

rewards.reward: Right On Dude \u2013 Your alias goes on the website and you\u2019ll get a Digital Downloadable copy of the game for PC that you\u2019ll need to hide from prying eyes.

Cool Dude \u2013 Your alias goes on the website, you get the Digital Downloadable copy of the game for PC to hide, and a Digital Downloadable copy of the game\u2019s soundtrack elements and an exclusive Desktop Wallpaper for your PC.

Stylin\u2019 Dude \u2013 Your alias goes on the website, you get the Digital Downloadable copy of the game, soundtrack elements and the wallpaper for PC, and a Drug Lord T-shirt that should not be worn under your uniform! Please add $5 for shipping to Canada, or $15 for shipping outside US/Canada.

Whoa Dude \u2013 Your alias goes on the website, you get Digital Downloadable copy of the game, soundtrack elements and the wallpaper for PC, a Drug Lord T-shirt that will attract unwanted attention, and a quality, signed print of rendered game art. (If the artists are incarcerated, a representative for Coresoft will sign the print.) Please add $5 for shipping to Canada, or $15 for shipping outside US/Canada.

Bodacious Dude \u2013 Your alias goes on the website, you get a Digital Downloadable copy of the game, soundtrack elements and the wallpaper for PC, two Drug Lord T-shirts that you may have to disavow, two quality, signed prints of rendered game art (If the artists have been placed in protective custody, representatives for Coresoft will sign the print.), and a commemorative cigar box (that may still reek of hand-rolled tobacco).

Crazy Dude \u2013 Your alias goes on the website and into the rules booklet, you get a Digital Downloadable copy of the game, soundtrack elements and the wallpaper for PC, two Drug Lord T-shirts that will probably get you into trouble, the commemorative cigar box AND Coresoft will create a game asset for the game based on a consultation/picture you provide. You\u2019ll receive both a digital image of the artwork suitable for a computer desktop, and a signed print of the rendered artwork that may be difficult to explain to the authorities.

Epic Dude \u2013 Your alias goes on the website and into the rules booklet, you get four Digital Downloadable copies of the game, soundtrack elements and the wallpaper for PC, four Drug Lord T-shirts of dubious distinction, four commemorative cigar boxes, and Coresoft will create a game asset for the game based on a consultation/picture you provide. You\u2019ll receive both a digital image of this artwork suitable for your computer desktop, a signed print of the rendered artwork, AND Coresoft will send four copies of any new expansions or sequels of Drug Lord.

Holy S**t Dude \u2013 Your alias goes on the website and into the rules booklet, you get thirteen (baker\u2019s dozen) Digital Downloadable copies of the game, soundtrack elements and the wallpaper for PC, thirteen Drug Lord T-shirts, thirteen commemorative cigar boxes, and Coresoft will create a game asset for the game based on a consultation/picture you provide. You\u2019ll receive both a digital image of the artwork suitable for a computer desktop, and a signed print of the rendered artwork. Coresoft will send thirteen copies of any new expansions or sequels of Drug Lord, AND Coresoft will craft a game scenario based upon our consultation with you!
